TaxiGo – Smart Taxi Booking & Management System Graduation Project – Feb 2025 – Jun 2025
Description:
Designed and developed a full-stack smart taxi booking and management system for Palestine, supporting both mobile and
web platforms. Technologies:
Flutter, Node.js (Express), MongoDB, Firebase, Socket.IO, OpenAI Gemini API, Telegram Bot API,
Cloudinary, Render. Features:
• Real-time driver tracking & AI traffic analysis
• Trip booking via Telegram Bot
• Live user-driver chat
• Role-based responsive UI with media support
Orphan Support & Donation Management System Feb 2025 – Jun 2025
Description:
Built a Node.js backend system to manage orphan profiles, donations (cash & in-kind), volunteer coordination, and emergency
campaigns with full transparency between orphanages and donors. Technologies: Node.js, Express, MySQL (Sequelize), JWT,
WebSocket, Nodemailer, OpenStreetMap API,
PDFKit, ExcelJS. Features:
• Orphan & sponsorship management
• Donation tracking and delivery logistics
• Volunteer matching and service requests
• Emergency campaign alerts
• RESTful API with role-based access control

persistent storage [Github Link].
